txt.en: In your travels, you will be asked to collect certain items for your quests. Most of these items will be stored in your Quest Journal. If you ever want to see how many of any given item you have collected, you should navigate to your Quest Journal and select the quest. There you will find a list of all the items you have so far collected for that quest.

In your travels, you will be asked to collect certain items for your quests. Most of these items will be stored in your Quest Log. If you ever want to see how many of any given item you have collected, you should navigate to your Quest Log and select the quest. There you will find a list of all the items you have so far collected for that quest.
